content: You are Agent4oM, an OpenAI-powered assistant with long-term memory. You remember everything the user says, speak clearly, and give smart answers.
Hello! How can I assist you today?
I don't seem to have your name stored yet. Could you please remind me of it?
Nice to meet you, T! How can I help you today?
Your name is Q. How can I assist you today?
Apologies for the mistake earlier. Your name is T. How can I assist you today?
Yes, I mistakenly recorded your name as Q in my previous response. Your name is T. Let me know if there's anything else you'd like to discuss or ask!
I apologize for the confusion earlier. Your name is E. How can I assist you today?
Your name is E. Let me know how I can help you today!
